description: AS-01 serves as the primary District Transport Office (DTO) for the Kamrup Metropolitan district and the state capital region. It is responsible for vehicle registration, licensing, and enforcement of transport regulations in Guwahati, one of the most populous cities in Northeast India.
address: District Transport Office, NH-37, Betkuchi, Near Honda Showroom, Guwahati, Assam

description: The AS-02 District Transport Office serves the Nagaon district in Assam. It is responsible for vehicle registration, driving license issuance, and ensuring compliance with motor vehicle regulations in one of the state's most populous and centrally located districts.
address: District Transport Office, Near ASTC Campus, Nagaon, Assam

description: AS-03 is the designated RTO code for the Jorhat District Transport Office in Assam. It is responsible for motor vehicle registration, issuance of driving licenses, and transport permit management for the Jorhat region.
address: District Transport Office, Rajabari, Jorhat, Assam

description: AS-04 is the District Transport Office (DTO) for the Sivasagar district in Assam. It handles vehicle registration, road tax collection, and the issuance of driving licenses for the historic region known for its Ahom dynasty landmarks.
address: District Transport Office, Dorika Par Namtial Pathar, Sivasagar, Assam

description: The AS-05 RTO functions as the District Transport Office (DTO) for Golaghat, Assam. It is responsible for motor vehicle registration, issuance of driving licenses, and the implementation of the Motor Vehicles Act across the district, including areas near Kaziranga National Park.
address: District Transport Office, Arengapara, Near Dhansiri Bridge, G.D. Road, Golaghat, Assam

description: The AS-06 District Transport Office serves the Dibrugarh district, a major tea-producing and industrial hub in Upper Assam. It manages vehicle registrations, commercial permits, and driving licenses for one of the most significant economic zones in the state.
address: District Transport Office, Near Lakhmi Nath Bezbaruah Park, Dibrugarh, Assam

description: The AS-07 RTO serves the Lakhimpur district in North Assam, headquartered in North Lakhimpur. It manages vehicle registrations, driving licenses, and transport permit issuance for the entire district under the Assam Transport Department.
address: District Transport Office, Chinatolia, P.O. North Lakhimpur, Dist. Lakhimpur, Assam

description: AS-08 RTO is the official registration authority for the Dima Hasao district in Assam, headquartered in the town of Haflong. It handles vehicle registration, issuance of driving licenses, and transport permit management for the entire hill district.
address: M.V. Branch, Office of the Deputy Commissioner, Dima Hasao, Haflong, Assam

description: AS-09 RTO represents the District Transport Office (DTO) of the Karbi Anglong district in Assam. Located in Diphu, this office handles motor vehicle registrations, driving licenses, and transport tax collection for one of the state's largest and most significant hill districts.
address: Office of the District Transport Officer (DTO), Diphu Town, Near DC Office, P.O. & P.S. Diphu, Karbi Anglong, Assam

description: The AS-10 RTO serves the Karimganj district in Assam and functions as the District Transport Office (DTO). It is responsible for vehicle registration, licensing, and enforcing motor vehicle regulations within the Barak Valley region. The office plays a critical role in managing transportation services near the international border with Bangladesh.
address: Settlement Road, Steamer Ghat, Karimganj Town, Assam
